body.name: SENSARTE Pots and Pans Set Nonstick, 14 Pcs Induction Kitchen Cookware Sets, Non-toxic Non Stick White Cooking Set with Frying Pans Set & Saucepan, PFOA PFOS APEO Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 7 mins
features: Healthy Natual Nonstick Skillet - SGS approved. Swiss imported, 100% non-toxic safe cookware, free of PFOA, PFOS, APEO, lead, cadmium and other toxic materials that can leach into food, safe for you, your family and the environment.

14 Piece White Cookware Set Includes - 8 inch & 9.5 inch frying pan set, 12inch/5Qt saute pan with lid, 6.5Qt casserole with lid, 2Qt saucepan with lid, 2pcs multi-purpose utensils, 4pcs pot protectors.

Non-stick & Easy to Clean - 3 layers non-stick cookware requires less oil to cook, prevent food from sticking, cleaning becomes a breeze, just wipe with a paper towel or rinse with water, giving you a healthier and easier home cooking experience.
Suitable For All Stoves - High magnetic conductive stainless steel base allows the skillet to work on all stoves, Induction compatible. Heats up quickly and evenly.
Die-cast aluminum - The SENSARTE cooking pot set is die-cast aluminum, heavy-duty, strong, and durable. They won't warp with many years of use.

Premium Design - The anti-scald wood grain bakelite handle is ergonomically designed for comfort, strength and maneuverability. The tempered glass lid has a 13 mm thick stainless steel rim to lock in moisture and ensure maximum visibility.
Improved Heat Retention - The heavy-gauge 4.5 mm aluminum base is designed to prevent hot spots and to enable quick, even heat distribution for perfect results every time.

Service & Guarantee – Quality first, Service Utmost. Each SENSARTE cookware passes strict multi-inspection process. In case you received defect items caused by delivery, please don't hesitate to reach out, thanks. You will be guaranteed to get 100% refund or a new replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Sensarte Natural White Cookware Sets? SAFE & HEALTHY - 100% free of PFOA, PFOS, APEO, lead, cadmium, and other heavy metals. PREMIUM CORROSION RESISTANCE - Harder surface and stronger adhesion provide a stronger barrier for better protection of pans. HIGH HEAT RESISTANCE - Performs well in thermal shock tests. Does not produce toxic fumes even when overheated. LONG LASTING DURABILITY - Scratch-resistant, abrasion-resistant, maintains good non-stick performance even after years of use. EASY TO CLEAN - Rivet-free design and premium non-stick technology make cleaning a breeze. DIE-CAST CONSTRUCTION- Heavy duty, strong and durable, no warping. Stands up to daily use. SPACE SAVING - Stacks and hangs to save space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pans I've ever owned
reviews.reviewText: We switched to ceramic pans after lots of research to get away from aluminum. These were not the cheapest, but modestly priced. I am thrilled. They are non stick and clean up easily. Very attractive hanging on our pan rack. Nice durable wooden handles. Bonus was recieving high quality screwdriver to assemble them. Will definitely buy these again in a few years. Highly reccomend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best nonstick pans I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I have already owned two pans by this company, and was waiting for them to put out a whole set so I could replace my older, other brand, pans. I was psyched when I saw this set!These are such good nonstick, when properly cared for, that they last for years. They are sturdy and well made, but not super heavy. The handles are very comfortable to grip. Even though I just received this set, I have owned two of the deep sauté pans for several years, so I will give my long term feedback on those also.First, comments on the new set and the packaging:It's all packed very compact, it's almost hard to believe there's a whole set in there. The pan handles and the knobs for the lids are separate. This saves on packaging, and they're very easy to assemble. They even include a screwdriver!Make sure to pay attention to which handles go on which pans. They look identical, but two of them are slightly larger than the others. I initially tried to put one of the smaller handles on the wrong pan, and it didn't fit properly. There's a very clear illustration that I could have referred to.Don't lose or forget to use the little washers that are on the screws! I did this with one of my older pans, and the handle was jiggling a little before I could replace the washer.The free utensils that were included are good quality and sturdy, and the dividers are very helpful.Here are my recommendations after owning the other pans for years:1. I don't put them in the dishwasher. They're so ridiculously easy to clean, it shouldn't be necessary anyway.2. I made the mistake of searing meat on high in the first one I owned, and it lessened the efficacy of the nonstick surface. It's still usable, but that's why I bought a second one. Incidentally, this was after over a year of use. The newer one, which I haven't seared anything in, I've owned for over a year now, and it's like brand new. I use it practically every day.3. The obvious, don't use metal cooking utensils or steel wool etc with these. Don't heat up without oil, butter, or food in the pan.If you take care of these, they should last for years. Nonstick pans are not known for their longevity, these are the exception that proves the rule. And the price can't be beat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer support ! Excellent products !
reviews.reviewText: These pots & pans are truly nonstick ! Looks nice & cleans easily as well . I've purchased white colored pots & have been using these almost everyday since I bought them & still they looks like new. not even a single stain! Ofcourse I only handwashed them & used only silicon & wooden spoons.I only had issue with one item & contacted the seller. seller responded very quickly & they solved my issue. They are truly awesome!I normally don't write reviews but they really deserves good reviews due to their good quality products & excellent customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid cookware set
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 3 months ago and used almost daily since that time. Problem with the non-stick coating on the large pan was significant but, the company replaced without issue. Replacement works quite well. First, the good: cookware set is extremely solid and durable. Cooktop to oven was no problem with large stockpot. Set is definitely thick and made to last. Lids fit well and steam vents work as expected. Customer service noted above is a major plus. The NOT-SO-GOOD: Handles get rather hot, especially for a cookware set in this price range. This is a good value but certainly not dollar store or discount junk. The nonstick coating works fairly well but it isn't amazing. For the first few months, most non-stick cookware is usually super slick and often doesn't even require non-stick spray or oil. This set definitely sticks if no oil or spray is used. That being said, I am pleased with the purchase. The durable nature of the cookware and the performance to cost ratio certainly warrant a solid 4 star review.
